Episodes.Title: Glanders
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: Elizabeth and Phillip are supposed to get a biological weapon sample but fail to make the exchange when someone is watching. Nina works Anton in hopes it will lead to her freedom. Paige wonders if she can trust Pastor Tim with her...

Episodes.Title: Pastor Tim
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: Philip tries with increasing desperation to get rid of a sensitive and dangerous package as family tensions in the Jennings House reach a boiling point when Paige shares a secret of her own.

Episodes.Title: Experimental Prototype City of Tomorrow
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: Paige copes with new burdens that come with her family's secret - as Philip and Elizabeth struggle to contain their cover without destroying their daughter.

Episodes.Title: Chloramphenicol
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: A devastating flaw during a mission forces Philip, Elizabeth, William, and Gabriel to confront the depths of their patriotism... and their mortality. In Russia, in striving to be a better person, has Nina put her life on the line?

Episodes.Title: Clark's Place
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: Philip must consider his life with Martha and make a crushing choice from which there is no coming back.

Episodes.Title: The Rat
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: Martha must finally face the truth she has denied - and her life may never be the same. Plus, a chilling new development in William's work forces the Jennings to face the realities of what a biological war would mean.

Episodes.Title: Travel Agents
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: The Centre rushes to prepare Martha's exfil as Directorate S agents try to locate her but, it seems that a backup transport was also ordered. FBI tears up the Clark Westerfeld apartment. Martha almost walks into the FBI dragnet. P...

Episodes.Title: The Magic of David Copperfield V: The Statue of Liberty Disappears
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: The Jennings hit their breaking points as they try to handle their local agents such as Martha.

Episodes.Title: The Day After
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: The Day After premieres, making the stakes - and terrible consequences - of the Cold War plain. Even with that in mind, will Elizabeth be able to complete the painful process of the "Patty" operation?

Episodes.Title: Munchkins
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: When Paige's long-ago indiscretion threatens to resurface and destroy the family, Philip and Elizabeth find themselves scrambling - and Paige finds herself reevaluating who her parents really are.

Episodes.Title: Dinner for Seven
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: Elizabeth completes the last steps of a very personal operation... but at what cost?

Episodes.Title: A Roy Rogers in Franconia
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: As Paige deals with last episode's trauma, she sees her mother in a new light... and finds she has inherited some of her parents' skills. Plus, has Oleg reached his breaking point with Stan?

Episodes.Title: Persona Non Grata
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker
Episodes.Plot: In the season 4 finale, Elizabeth & Philip race against the FBI to retrieve a mysterious package. Paige finally begins considering whether or not she would like to enter the family business.
